{{NCAATeamFootballSeason |Year=1969 |Team=Wyoming Cowboys |Image= |ImageSize = |Conference=Western Athletic Conference |Division= |ShortConference=WAC |Record=6-4 |ConfRecord=4-3 |CoachRank= Not ranked |APRank=Not ranked |HeadCoach=[[Lloyd Eaton]] |OffCoach= |DefCoach= |OScheme= |DScheme= |Stadium=[[War Memorial Stadium (Wyoming)|War Memorial Stadium]] |Champion= |BowlTourney= |BowlTourneyResult= }} The '''1969 Wyoming Cowboys football team''' represented the [[University of Wyoming]] in the 1969 NCAA football season. The Cowboys offense scored 242 points while the defense allowed 118 points. Led by head coach Lloyd Eaton, the Cowboys won seven games. ==Schedule==
